properties.description: The unique ID of the TrapPreset.
properties.name: id

properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the TrapPreset (a Application or Document).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: The index of the TrapPreset within its containing object.
properties.name: index

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: The name of the TrapPreset.
properties.name: name

properties.description: The default width for trapping all colors except those involving solid black. (Range depends on unit. For points: 0.0 to 8.0; picas: 0p0 to 0p8; inches: 0 to 0.1111; mm: 0 to 2.822; cm: 0 to .2822; ciceros: 0c0 to 0c7.507)
properties.name: defaultTrapWidth

properties.description: The black width. (Range depends on unit. For points: 0.0 to 8.0; picas: 0p0 to 0p8; inches: 0 to 0.1111; mm: 0 to 2.822; cm: 0 to .2822; ciceros: 0c0 to 0c7.507)
properties.name: blackWidth

properties.description: The join type of the trap preset.
properties.name: trapJoin

properties.description: The shape to use at the intersection of three-way traps.
properties.name: trapEnd

properties.description: If true, ensures that vector objects overlap bitmap images.
properties.name: objectsToImages

properties.description: If true, turns on trapping along the boundary of overlapping or abutting bitmap images.
properties.name: imagesToImages

properties.description: If true, turns on trapping among colors within individual bitmap images.
properties.name: internalImages

properties.description: If true, ensures that one-bit images trap to abutting objects.
properties.name: oneBitImages

properties.description: The trap placement between vector objects and bitmap images.
properties.name: imagePlacement

properties.description: The amount (as a percentage) that components of abutting colors must vary before a trap is created. (Range: 1 to 100)
properties.name: stepThreshold

properties.description: The minimum amount (as a percentage) of black ink required before the black width setting is applied. (Range: 0 to 100)
properties.name: blackColorThreshold

properties.description: The neutral density value at or above which an ink is considered black. (Range: .001 to 10)
properties.name: blackDensity

properties.description: The difference (as a percentage) between the neutral densities of abutting colors at which the trap is moved from the darker side of a color edge toward the centerline. (Range: 0 to 100)
properties.name: slidingTrapThreshold

properties.description: The degree (as a percentage) to which components from abutting colors are used to reduce the trap color. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: 0% makes a trap whose neutral density is equal to the neutral density of the darker color.
properties.name: colorReduction

properties.description: A property that can be set to any string.
properties.name: label

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

parameters.description: The trap preset to apply in place of the deleted preset.
parameters.name: replacingWith

methods.description: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.
methods.name: insertLabel

methods.description: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.
methods.name: extractLabel

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TrapPreset.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
